title: It's Your Turn Now: Manifesting the Life You Deserve
description: Have you experimented with the Law of Attraction and gotten uneven results--including the opposite of what you wanted?So did I! Are you confused and overwhelmed by all the conflicting advice? So was I! Do you want to know how to make the Law of Attraction work more consistently for you so that you can have a better life?It's my belief that we need to do some basic work on ourselves to get really clear about what we want. Otherwise we will get what we don't want mixed in with what we do want. So I've sorted it all out for you into short lessons set in what I believe is the most beneficial order in order to help you get clear.Since following my own directions I've tripled my income, had non beneficial relationships disappear from my life, found the perfect place to live, and am entirely confident that I will continue to manifest my very best life. And I know you can do the same!
author: Jayne Sinclair
